Name: Zenitsu and Inosuke
Desc:
Defeating monsters within the level range fills the gauge,
preparing Thunder Breathing First Form: Thunderclap and Flash Sixfold.
Every 100 monsters defeated summons Inosuke to attack nearby enemies.
Limited to 30 activations per day
for .

Right-click to toggle On/Off.

Right-click to toggle on/off.
